title: Chapter One: The Audition Anxiety
summary: Aarav feels a mix of excitement and nervousness as he auditions for the school play, only to find out that Anaya has landed a bigger role.

title: Chapter Two: The Green-Eyed Monster
summary: Aarav struggles with jealousy towards Anaya, but learns to recognize and manage his emotions with the help of his friends.

title: Chapter Three: The Wise Words of Grandpa Dev
summary: Grandpa Dev shares his wisdom with Aarav, teaching him the importance of self-awareness and empathy.

title: Chapter Four: The Rollercoaster of Emotions
summary: Aarav experiences a range of emotions during rehearsals, from frustration to joy, as he navigates his role in the play.

title: Chapter Five: The Power of Positive Self-Talk
summary: Aarav learns to use positive affirmations to boost his confidence and overcome self-doubt.

title: Chapter Six: The Friendship Test
summary: Aarav faces a conflict with his friend Karan, but learns the value of communication and compromise in resolving their differences.

title: Chapter Seven: The Big Performance
summary: Aarav faces his fears and delivers a stellar performance in the school play, showcasing his growth in emotional intelligence.

title: Chapter Eight: The Post-Show Blues
summary: Aarav struggles with a sense of emptiness after the play ends, but finds solace in reflecting on the memories and lessons learned.

title: Chapter Nine: The Joy of Creativity
summary: Aarav discovers the therapeutic power of creative expression as he channels his emotions into writing and drawing.

title: Chapter Ten: The Family Feast
summary: Aarav's family comes together for a special celebration, where he learns to appreciate the support and love of his loved ones.

title: Chapter Eleven: The Healing Power of Laughter
summary: Aarav finds solace in humor and laughter during tough times, realizing the importance of positivity in handling emotions.

title: Chapter Twelve: The Everlasting Journey
summary: Aarav reflects on his emotional growth throughout the story, recognizing that handling emotions is a lifelong journey filled with ups and downs.
